text: Batié is a town in the West Region in Cameroon. It is close to the provincial capital Bafoussam. It is known for its football club called Sable FC. The town is on the National Road 5. Le marché is a local market that happens every 8 days. Batié has a very mild climate. The rainy season is from March through October. The dry season is from November through March. Category:Towns in Africa Category:Settlements in Cameroon
title: Batié, Cameroon
